helio.framework.materialiser.mappings

Class DataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.framework.materialiser.mappings.DataSource

  • public class DataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a source of data, which consist in a DataProvider that retrieves data from the source and a DataHandler that filters and retrieves only the relevant information from the fetched data-

    Additionally, a DataSource can be synchronous, and its related RDF will be generated when required by a user, or asynchronous, and its related RDF will be generated periodically as specified in the refresh attribute.

    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

      • DataSource

        public DataSource()

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(java.lang.String id,
                  DataHandler dataHandler,
                  DataProvider dataProvider)
        This constructor initializes a synchronous data source
        Parameters:
        id - a unique id for the data source
        dataHandler - a DataHandler to manage the data
        dataProvider - a DataProvider to fetch the data

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(java.lang.String id,
                  DataHandler dataHandler,
                  DataProvider dataProvider,
                  java.lang.Integer refresh)
        This constructor initializes a asynchronous data source
        Parameters:
        id - a unique id for the data source
        dataHandler - a DataHandler to manage the data
        dataProvider - a DataProvider to fetch the data
        refresh - a quantum of time in milliseconds, the data related to this data source will be generated periodically each refresh time provided and injected in the cache
